channel.title: Reccomend a good client + server OPEN source?
channel.description:
Anyone have a good server source + client, that is OPEN for editing?
Please share. I am looking for something more runescape-like. As in, normal XP gains, NPC's spawned just like in runescape, No "Statue Pressing" to get exp. JUst a normal server open source where you have to slowly kill monsters in order to get exp. Have to go into the wilderness for PvP....
I am planning to make a server with many ideas. It will be like, but also different from runescape.
If you help you will be mentioned in the credits =]
Thank you, Killax

item.title: Reccomend a good client + server OPEN source?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Server Download Rules:

5) No Requests Rather straightforward - don’t post a topic requesting a certain source download link to be given to you. Use your resources such as the search button to your advantage. Doing so will result in a warning or moderation.

Read full topic
